content: A short TV commercial produced by me at the Pre-Production stage (ideation, conception, storyboarding and shot list) with fruit juice as the product.
I used Blender and Adobe Premiere to create this 3D animation including creating characters, backgrounds and character rigs.

My teammates and I created a short video advertising chilli sauce with the support of Celtx software to write the script, Adobe Illustration to draw the storyboard and Adobe Premiere + Adobe After Effect to complete the video in post-production.
A simple interview video was created by me and a classmate as the interviewee.

This is a promotional video when I am having the co-op at Ajile company, the video was created under the idea of ​​my manager to advertise products for their company. Video produced by Blender, Adobe Premiere and Adobe After Effects software.

The video was produced based on the college's final assignment requirements. My teammates and I created this short video to promote a new technological product that comes from our imagination. We cooperated closely from the idea stage, filming and creating effects for sound and visuals at the end of the video.
